verses.roman:
tāra madhye chaya vatsara--gamanāgamana
kabhu dakṣiṇa, kabhu gauḍa, kabhu vṛndāvana

synonyms: tāra madhye—out of that; chaya vatsara—six years; gamana-āgamana—touring; kabhu—sometimes; dakṣiṇa—in South India; kabhu—sometimes; gauḍa—in Bengal; kabhu—sometimes; vṛndāvana—in Vṛndāvana.
translation: Of these last twenty-four years, He spent the first six years continuously touring India, sometimes in South India, sometimes in Bengal and sometimes in Vṛndāvana.
